com.team6.project.validators

Class AllTrueCompositeValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team6.project.validators.AllTrueCompositeValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IValidator

    public class AllTrueCompositeValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements IValidator
    Composed by a collection of IValidator object returns true only if each IValidator returns true.
    Author:
    Cristiana

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AllTrueCompositeValidator()
      Initializes the IValidators Collection as an empty ArrayList

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(Record record,
              BaseData baseData,
              DataImportServiceLocal service)
        Return false at the first IValidator that returns false. If all IValidator are true, it builds the BaseData object using the Record object
        Specified by:
        isValid in interface IValidator
        Parameters:
        Record - object that contains raw data
        BaseData - object valued with data from record if validations are satisfied
        DataImportServiceLocal - contains HashMaps valued with the data of the auxiliary tables
        Returns:
        true if the validation is satisfied
